product_name: Kelty Cosmic Down 32 Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Snuggle up in comfort on frosty late spring mornings and brisk fall nights with the women's Kelty Cosmic Down 32degF sleeping bag. It provides exceptional warmth at a great price. Soft, high-loft 550-fill-power duck down insulation provides exceptional warmth and light weight. Baffle construction with differential cut eliminates cold spots; inner layer is cut smaller than the outer layer to create consistent thickness of insulation. Designed for women, with a narrow cut at the shoulders, more width at the hips and extra insulation in the footbox and torso where it's needed most. Polyester taffeta shell is smooth yet durable; polyester taffeta lining breathes for comfort and feels great against skin. Top baffle draft collar drapes comfortably over neck and shoulders, sealing out drafts. Formfitting hood has drawcords of differing widths at head and neck for easy identification and adjustment in the dark. Ground-level side seam keeps draft tube in place, further helping prevent cold air from seeping through the 2-way, locking zipper. Internal loops provide attachment for a liner (sold separately) to increase the warmth of the bag. Pad loops provide attachment points to keep your sleeping bag and pad together, so you needn't worry about rolling onto the cold, hard ground (straps sold separately). Hang loops allow easy drying and storage. Kelty Cosmic Down 32degF women's sleeping bag comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: Snuggle up in comfort on frosty late spring mornings and brisk fall nights with the women's Kelty Cosmic Down 32degF sleeping bag. It provides exceptional warmth at a great price.
